home.name: Destio Wahyu Lanio
home.title: Web Developer, Network Enthusiast, Video Editor
home.description: Hey! I’m Destio, an Informatics Engineering graduate who’s really into web development, video editing, and computer networking. During college, I worked on a lot of web apps since my major focused on Software Engineering. I also enjoy tinkering with servers and exploring new things around networking. Outside of tech stuff, I love editing videos and making music just for fun or to explore new creative ideas.

about.description: A brief introduction about me and my interest.

education.title: Education
education.universityDescription: Graduated with a degree in Informatics Engineering, specializing in Software Engineering, and particularly passionate about web development.
education.highSchoolDescription: Graduated with excellent academic performance and active in various school activities.

contact.title: Let's connect
contact.description: Feel free to contact me if you have any

home.name: Destio Wahyu Lanio
home.title: Web Developer, Network Enthusiast, Video Editor
home.description: Hai! Aku Destio, lulusan Teknik Informatika yang suka banget sama web development, video editing, dan jaringan komputer. Selama kuliah, aku sering bikin aplikasi web karena fokus jurusanku di Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak. Kadang aku juga ngulik server dan nyobain hal-hal baru seputar networking. Di luar tech stuff, aku sering ngedit video dan bisa dibilang udah pengalaman lah, lalu aku juga suka main musik buat hobi dan fun biar ngga gabut.

about.title: Tentangku
about.description: Tak kenal maka sayang, yaudah kenalan yuk!

education.universityDescription: Lulusan Teknik Informatika dengan IPK 3.73/4.00! Aku suka ngulik hal-hal seputar Software Engineering dan web development.
